title: 10 Times The World Was Predicted To End. But It Didn't
content: Predictions of the world's end have been made for centuries, from floods to fires to comets. But none have come true.
summary: Predictions of the world's end have been made for centuries, from floods to fires to comets. But none have come true.

title: Pics: Tear Gas, Rocks, And Looting As Kenya Police And Protesters Clash
content: Crowds in Kenya's capital Nairobi lobbed rocks and looted businesses as police officers fired tear gas in scattered violence during fresh anti-government protests on Tuesday following last month's deadly demonstrations.
summary: Crowds in Kenya's capital Nairobi lobbed rocks and looted businesses as police officers fired tear gas in scattered violence during fresh anti-government protests on Tuesday following last month's deadly demonstrations.

title: "Genocide-Enabling": Another US Official Quits Over Biden's Gaza Policy
content: President Joe Biden's support for Israel during its nearly nine-month war in Gaza has spurred at least nine U.S. administration officials to quit.
summary: President Joe Biden's support for Israel during its nearly nine-month war in Gaza has spurred at least nine U.S. administration officials to quit.

title: Dangerous Skin Diseases Spreading Among Malnourished Children In Gaza
content: Wafaa Elwan's five-year-old son cannot sleep in the Gaza tent city where she and her seven children shelter, but it is not the guns of war that cause his daily nightmare.
summary: Wafaa Elwan's five-year-old son cannot sleep in the Gaza tent city where she and her seven children shelter, but it is not the guns of war that cause his daily nightmare.

title: Watch: Passenger Stuck In Overhead Bin During Severe Turbulence
content: Videos from inside the plane have surfaced on social media which shows passengers helping a fellow flyer out of an overhead bin storage area.
summary: Videos from inside the plane have surfaced on social media which shows passengers helping a fellow flyer out of an overhead bin storage area.

title: Hurricane Beryl Wreaks Havoc, Turns To Jamaica, Haiti, Dominican Republic
content: Hurricane Beryl barreled toward Jamaica as a powerful Category 4 storm on Tuesday, threatening to dump rain on parts of Hispaniola after leaving at least three people dead on smaller islands in the eastern Caribbean.
summary: Hurricane Beryl barreled toward Jamaica as a powerful Category 4 storm on Tuesday, threatening to dump rain on parts of Hispaniola after leaving at least three people dead on smaller islands in the eastern Caribbean.

title: Relief For Trump As Hush Money Case Sentencing Delayed Till September
content: By invoking the Supreme Court ruling on presidential immunity, former US President Donald Trump has won a timely reprieve by getting the court to agree to delay his sentencing till after the Republican Party Convention.
summary: By invoking the Supreme Court ruling on presidential immunity, former US President Donald Trump has won a timely reprieve by getting the court to agree to delay his sentencing till after the Republican Party Convention.

title: "Almost Fell Asleep": Biden Reacts To Debate Debacle Against Trump
content: US President Joe Biden today blamed international travel and jet lag for his debate debacle against his Republican rival Donald Trump.
summary: US President Joe Biden today blamed international travel and jet lag for his debate debacle against his Republican rival Donald Trump.

title: UK Labour Party To Outdo 1997 Landslide Victory This Time, Poll Predicts
content: The UK Labour Party is 99 per cent "certain" to secure more seats in Thursday's general election than when it won a landslide victory in 1997, a major new poll said on Tuesday.
summary: The UK Labour Party is 99 per cent "certain" to secure more seats in Thursday's general election than when it won a landslide victory in 1997, a major new poll said on Tuesday.

title: Google Greenhouse Gas Emissions Grow To Meet Energy Demands To Power AI
content: Google, despite its goal of achieving net-zero emissions, is pumping out more greenhouse gas than before as it powers data centers needed to support artificial intelligence, the company said.
summary: Google, despite its goal of achieving net-zero emissions, is pumping out more greenhouse gas than before as it powers data centers needed to support artificial intelligence, the company said.

title: US Supreme Court Agrees To Review Age Verification Law For Online Porn
content: The US Supreme Court on Tuesday agreed to hear a challenge to a law in Republican-led Texas that requires pornographic websites to verify the age of visitors in order to limit minors' access to online sexual content.
summary: The US Supreme Court on Tuesday agreed to hear a challenge to a law in Republican-led Texas that requires pornographic websites to verify the age of visitors in order to limit minors' access to online sexual content.

title: Car That Putin Gifted To Kim Jong Un Uses Parts From South Korea: Report
content: Laughing and joking, Russian President Vladimir Putin and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un cruised around Pyongyang last week in a Russian-made Aurus limousine to showcase their strengthened anti-Western alliance.
summary: Laughing and joking, Russian President Vladimir Putin and North Korean leader Kim Jong-un cruised around Pyongyang last week in a Russian-made Aurus limousine to showcase their strengthened anti-Western alliance.

title: Taiwan Claims China Seizes Its Fishing Boat Near Chinese Coast
content: Chinese officials boarded and then seized a Taiwanese fishing boat operating near China's coast close to a Taiwan-controlled island and took it to a Chinese port, the Taiwan coast guard said late on Tuesday in a further escalation of tensions.
summary: Chinese officials boarded and then seized a Taiwanese fishing boat operating near China's coast close to a Taiwan-controlled island and took it to a Chinese port, the Taiwan coast guard said late on Tuesday in a further escalation of tensions.

title: 900 Militants Killed In Rafah Since May, Claims Israel Army Chief
content: Israel has killed about 900 militants in Rafah since the beginning of Israel's ground assault on the southernmost city in Gaza in early May, Israel's military Chief Herzi Halevi said.
summary: Israel has killed about 900 militants in Rafah since the beginning of Israel's ground assault on the southernmost city in Gaza in early May, Israel's military Chief Herzi Halevi said.

title: Biden Blames Foreign Travel For Poor Debate Performance
content: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday blamed his recent foreign travels for his debate debacle.
summary: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday blamed his recent foreign travels for his debate debacle.

title: After Debate Debacle, White House Fights Anxiety Over Biden's Health
content: Democrats shocked by Joe Biden's dismal debate performance urged the US president Tuesday to be transparent about his mental fitness as he faced the first call from his own side to drop out of the election.
summary: Democrats shocked by Joe Biden's dismal debate performance urged the US president Tuesday to be transparent about his mental fitness as he faced the first call from his own side to drop out of the election.

title: Kamala Harris Has A Better Chance Of Retaining White House Than Biden: Poll
content: Vice President Kamala Harris, who is of Indian and African heritage, has a better chance of retaining the White House in the November presidential polls than her boss President Joe Biden has, according to a latest CNN poll.
summary: Vice President Kamala Harris, who is of Indian and African heritage, has a better chance of retaining the White House in the November presidential polls than her boss President Joe Biden has, according to a latest CNN poll.

title: Macron Urges Netanyahu To Prevent Israel-Hezbollah "Conflagration"
content: French President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday urged Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu to prevent a "conflagration" between Israel and Hezbollah militants in Lebanon, during a telephone call between the two leaders.
summary: French President Emmanuel Macron on Tuesday urged Israeli leader Benjamin Netanyahu to prevent a "conflagration" between Israel and Hezbollah militants in Lebanon, during a telephone call between the two leaders.

title: Yemen's Houthis Claim Attack On Vital Target In Israel's Haifa
content: Yemen's Houthis said on Tuesday that they, along with the Islamic resistance in Iraq, have conducted a joint military operation, attacking a vital target in Israel's Haifa.
summary: Yemen's Houthis said on Tuesday that they, along with the Islamic resistance in Iraq, have conducted a joint military operation, attacking a vital target in Israel's Haifa.

title: US Court Postpones Trump's Hush Money Sentencing To September 18
content: A judge postponed on Tuesday Donald Trump's sentencing following his conviction for covering up hush money payments until September 18 to allow time for a Supreme Court ruling on presidential immunity to be considered.
summary: A judge postponed on Tuesday Donald Trump's sentencing following his conviction for covering up hush money payments until September 18 to allow time for a Supreme Court ruling on presidential immunity to be considered.
